thread.title: Best of all experience in Beijing
thread.title_full: Best of all experience in Beijing - Review of Waldorf Astoria Beijing, Beijing, China - TripAdvisor

author: Tarekelerian
title: Best of all experience in Beijing
text:
I've ben visiting Beijing on Business for the last 17 years residing at the same are in different Hotels for the last 10 years and 10 days ago i was booked there on a suggestion of a friend and it was a great experience that i returned back once and will be back next week, Excellent rooms, staff very friends and well English spoken, Restaurant very good and I was well taken care of and had one of my best experiences and thanks to Mr. Gastinel i would be moving company guests there as well.
Room Tip: Rooms on higher floors have better view See more room tips
